SELECT DATA.TK_HIN,DATA.SYUYO_SU,DATA.SEBAN,DATA.SIJI_SU,DATA.SIJI_HAKO, DATA.HAN_SU,DATA.HAN_HAKO,DATA.SIJI_HAKO - DATA.HAN_HAKO AS SA, MA.S_KYOTEN, MA.SEIZO_BA FROM
TB_HANNYU_RI DATA, (SELECT TK_HIN,SYUYO_SU,MAX(S_KYOTEN) S_KYOTEN, MAX(SEIZO_BA) SEIZO_BA FROM TB_HINBAN_MA GROUP BY TK_HIN,SYUYO_SU) MA
TB_HANHIN_JO DATA , (SELECT TK_HIN,SYUYO_SU,MAX(S_KYOTEN) S_KYOTEN, MAX(SEIZO_BA) SEIZO_BA FROM TB_HINBAN_MA GROUP BY TK_HIN,SYUYO_SU) MA
WHERE DATA.BIN_ID = #bin_id# AND DATA.HAN_YMD = #han_ymd# AND DATA.TOKUSYA_KB = #tokusya_kb# AND DATA.TOKUSYA_KAI = #tokusya_kai# AND DATA.TK_HIN = MA.TK_HIN(+) AND DATA.SYUYO_SU = MA.SYUYO_SU(+) ORDER BY DATA.TK_HIN,DATA.SYUYO_SU
